title: Why the Ottoman and Russian Empires collapsed

content.question: Which of the following statements best represents a nationalistic interpretation of the collapse of the Ottoman and Russian empires during and immediately after the First World War?

choices.label: Military weakness and political instability were the primary reasons for the collapse of these empires.
The growing demands of various ethnic groups within these multiethnic empires were the primary reasons for the collapse.
The slow pace of industrialization in these empires left them unable to compete militarily and politically with more developed countries.
Religious differences between the Russian Empire and the Ottoman Empire led to their final collapse.

content.answer: The growing demands of various ethnic groups within these multiethnic empires were the primary reasons for the collapse.
